name: youtube-chat-highlighter
description: Highlight YouTube chats that is filtered with user config

scripts.watch: parcel watch src/popup.html src/img/icon-34.png src/img/icon-128.png src/js/www.js src/js/gaming.js src/manifest.json
scripts.start: parcel src/popup.html src/img/icon-34.png src/img/icon-128.png src/js/www.js src/js/gaming.js src/manifest.json
scripts.build: parcel build --no-source-maps -d youtube-comment-highlighter src/popup.html src/img/icon-34.png src/img/icon-128.png src/js/www.js src/js/gaming.js src/manifest.json

author: tee-talog
